prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Drums, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:

This piece of music features Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, and Drums, but no Brass.

Style 2:

This song is composed of Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, and Drums, omitting Brass.

Style 3:

This composition is comprised of Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, and Drums, excluding Brass.
